entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
